body.p: A request from the Portage team, download statistics for last week's 2006.0 release, and a short report from the PPC team meeting constitute today's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. Three upcoming international events in London (Gentoo UK conference), San Jose (Freescale Gentoo seminar) and Bonn (FrOSCon) call for papers and/or attendants, , the Gentoo in the press section carries much more than clippings from 2006.0 reviews, and security announcements and bugzilla statistics complete this week's edition. Have fun reading your GWN!
